description: Baseline test for SQL generation and location filtering.
Tests Week 5 Fuzzy Matching (Levenshtein) against 'Software Engineer' and 'Hyderabad'.
Tests Week 2 Ontology. Should find jobs listing 'JavaScript', 'Frontend', or 'Web Development' even if 'React' isn't explicitly in the description.
Tests Week 11 SCORE. Should rank 'Software Architect' higher than a job having 'architect' in the footer text.
Tests Week 8 Rule-Down-Rules. 'Fresher' should translate to 'Experience: 0-1 years' in SQL.

query: Data Scientist with Python skills and salary above 20 lakhs
description: Tests Week 3 GAV. Needs to map 'salary' to both 'normalized_salary' (Source A) and 'Salary Range' (Source B).
Tests LLM intent resolution. Should look for 'Team Lead', 'Tech Lead', 'Manager'.
Tests Week 5 Blocking. Should normalize 'TCS' and 'Tata Consultancy Services' to the same entity.

query: How do I prepare for a data science interview?
description: Tests system routing. Should BYPASS the SQL database and go straight to LLM.
Tests robustness. Should handle garbage input gracefully without crashing.
